TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataAdapter

summary.span: 允許物件實作 DataAdapter，並表示用來填滿和更新 並更新資料來源的方法集和對應動作相關屬性集。

span.span: Allows an object to implement a DataAdapter, and represents a set of methods and mapping action-related properties that are used to fill and update a and update a data source.

summary.span: 執行個體適用於本身為 (或類似於) 採用文字命令 (例如 Transact-SQL) 之關聯式資料庫的資料來源，而 執行個體則可以使用任何類型的資料來源。

span.span: instances are for data sources that are (or resemble) relational databases with textual commands (like Transact-SQL), while instances could can use any type of data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面可讓繼承的類別來實作資料配接器類別，代表資料來源之間的橋樑， 。The interface allows an inheriting class to implement a DataAdapter class, which represents the bridge between a data source and a . 如需詳細資料配接器類別的詳細資訊，請參閱[從 DataAdapter 填入 DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/populating-a-dataset-from-a-dataadapter.md)。For more information about DataAdapter classes, see [Populating a DataSet from a DataAdapter](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/populating-a-dataset-from-a-dataadapter.md). 應用程式不會建立的執行個體介面直接，但會實作繼承的類別的執行個體。An application does not create an instance of the interface directly, but implements an instance of a class that inherits . 繼承的類別必須實作繼承的成員，以及它們通常會定義要新增提供者特有的功能的其他成員。Classes that inherit must implement the inherited members, and they typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality. 例如，介面會定義採用方法做為參數。For example, the interface defines a method that takes a as a parameter. 依次類別會繼承方法，也會定義兩個額外的多載需要 ADO 資料錄集物件，做為參數的方法。In turn, the class inherits the method and also defines two additional overloads of the method that take an ADO Recordset object as a parameter. ## Examples 下列範例會使用衍生的類別， ， ，和、 從資料庫選取資料錄。The following example uses the derived classes, , , and , to select records from a database. 區域分布再傳回。The filled is then returned. 若要這樣做，方法傳遞初始化，連接字串，而是 TRANSACT-SQL SELECT 陳述式的查詢字串。To do this, the method is passed an initialized , a connection string, and a query string that is a Transact-SQL SELECT statement. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 若要升級.NET Framework 資料提供者之間的一致性，命名為在表單中繼承的類別DataAdapter 其中是統一的前置詞提供給特定的.NET Framework 資料提供者命名空間中的所有類別。

span.span: To promote consistency among .NET Framework data providers, name the inheriting class in the form DataAdapter where is the uniform prefix given to all classes in a specific .NET Framework data provider namespace.

para.span: 例如，是的前置詞類別中命名空間。

span.span: For example, is the prefix of the class in the namespace.

para.span: 當您繼承自介面，您應該實作下列建構函式：

span.span: When you inherit from the interface, you should implement the following constructors:
Item
Description

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the PrvDataAdapter class by using an SQL SELECT statement and a PrvConnection object.

param.name: dataSet
param.span: 要填入資料錄和結構描述 (如果必要的話) 的 。

summary.span: 使用 名稱，加入或更新 中的資料列，以符合那些在資料來源中的資料列，並建立命名為 "Table" 的 。

span.span: Adds or updates rows in the to match those in the data source using the name, and creates a named "Table".

returns.span: 成功加入至 或在其中重新整理的資料列數目。

span.span: The number of rows successfully added to or refreshed in the .

returns.span: 這不包含被不傳回資料列之陳述式所影響的資料列。

span.span: This does not include rows affected by statements that do not return rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從使用 SELECT 陳述式指定由相關聯的資料來源擷取資料列屬性。 retrieves rows from the data source using the SELECT statement specified by an associated property. SELECT 陳述式相關聯的連接物件必須是有效的但它不需要開啟。The connection object associated with the SELECT statement must be valid, but it does not need to be open. 如果連線已關閉之前會呼叫它，它會開啟來擷取資料，然後關閉。If the connection is closed before is called, it is opened to retrieve data, then closed. 如果連接已開啟之前是呼叫，它會保持開啟狀態。If the connection is open before is called, it remains open. 作業，然後將資料列加入到目的地中的物件建立物件如果它們尚不存在。The operation then adds the rows to destination objects in the , creating the objects if they do not already exist. 建立時物件，作業通常會建立只有資料行名稱中繼資料。When creating objects, the operation usually creates only column name metadata. 不過，如果屬性設定為`AddWithKey`，也會建立適當的主索引鍵和條件約束。However, if the property is set to `AddWithKey`, appropriate primary keys and constraints are also created. 如果 `SelectCommand` 傳回 OUTER JOIN 的結果，則 `DataAdapter` 便不會為產生的 設定 值。If the `SelectCommand` returns the results of an OUTER JOIN, the `DataAdapter` does not set a value for the resulting . 您必須明確定義以確保正確解析重複的資料列的主索引鍵。You must explicitly define the primary key to ensure that duplicate rows are resolved correctly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 定義主索引鍵](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md)。For more information, see [Defining Primary Keys](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md). 如果遇到重複的資料行在填入，它會產生連續的資料行，並使用模式 」 columnname1"、"columnname2 」、 「 columnname3"，等等的名稱。If the encounters duplicate columns while populating a , it generates names for the successive columns, using the pattern "columnname1", "columnname2", "columnname3", and so on. 如果內送資料中包含未命名資料行，它們都放根據模式"Column1"、"Column2"，依此類推。If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are put in the according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on. 當多個結果集加入至，每個結果集放在個別的資料表。When multiple result sets are added to the , each result set is put in a separate table. 其他結果集的命名方式將整數值附加至指定的資料表名稱 （例如，"Table"、"Table1"、"Table2"，等等）。Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on). 使用資料行和資料表名稱，以確保沒有這些命名模式的衝突時，應用程式應謹慎小心。Applications should use caution when using column and table names to ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns do not occur. 當 SELECT 陳述式，用來填入傳回多個結果，例如 SQL 陳述式的批次，如果其中一個結果包含錯誤，所有後續的結果會略過且未新增到。When the SELECT statement that is used to populate the returns multiple results, such as a batch SQL statement, if one of the results contains an error, all successive results are skipped and not added to the . 您可以使用上多次相同的方法。You can use the method multiple times on the same . 如果主索引鍵存在，內送資料列會合併與相符的資料列已經存在。If a primary key exists, incoming rows are merged with matching rows that already exist. 如果沒有主索引鍵存在，將內送資料列附加至。If no primary key exists, incoming rows are appended to the . > [!NOTE] > 當處理批次 SQL 陳述式會傳回多個結果，實作和.NET Framework 資料提供者會擷取第一個結果的結構描述資訊。When handling batch SQL statements that return multiple results, the implementation of and for a .NET Framework data provider retrieves schema information for only the first result.

param.name: dataSet

One of the values.

summary.span: 新增一個名為 "Table" 的 至指定的 ，並且設定符合指定的 上之資料來源的結構描述。

span.span: Adds a named "Table" to the specified and configures the schema to match that in the data source based on the specified .

returns.span: 物件的陣列，包含從資料來源傳回的結構描述資訊。

span.span: An array of objects that contain schema information returned from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會擷取結構描述從資料來源使用。The method retrieves the schema from the data source using the . 連接物件相關聯必須是有效的但它不需要開啟。The connection object associated with the must be valid, but it does not need to be open. 如果連線已關閉之前會呼叫它，它會開啟來擷取資料，然後關閉。If the connection is closed before is called, it is opened to retrieve data, then closed. 如果連接已開啟之前是呼叫，它會保持開啟狀態。If the connection is open before is called, it remains open. A作業會將加入到目的地。A operation adds a to the destination . 接著它會加入至資料行的，並設定下列如果它們存在於資料來源的屬性：It then adds columns to the of the and configures the following properties if they exist at the data source: - - .. 您必須設定和分開。You must set and separately. - - - 也會設定和屬性根據下列規則： also configures the and properties according to the following rules: - 如果所傳回的一或多個主要的索引鍵資料行，做為主要索引鍵資料行。If one or more primary key columns are returned by the , they are used as the primary key columns for the . - 如果傳回沒有主索引鍵資料行，但唯一資料行，唯一的資料行會使用主索引鍵，如果所有唯一的資料行不可為 null。If no primary key columns are returned but unique columns are, the unique columns are used as the primary key if all the unique columns are non-nullable. 如果任何資料行可為 null，新增至，但屬性未設定。If any of the columns are nullable, a is added to the , but the property is not set. - 如果傳回主要索引鍵資料行及唯一的資料行，將主索引鍵資料行做為主要索引鍵資料行。If both primary key columns and unique columns are returned, the primary key columns are used as the primary key columns for the . 請注意，會將主索引鍵和唯一條件約束加入至不加入根據先前的規則，但其他條件約束類型。Note that primary keys and unique constraints are added to the according to the previous rules, but other constraint types are not added. 如果唯一的叢集資料行或將 SQL Server 資料表中的資料行上定義索引和叢集索引中的資料行的名稱將會傳回一組個別的資料行上定義主索引鍵條件約束。If a unique clustered index is defined on a column or columns in a SQL Server table and the primary key constraint is defined on a separate set of columns, then the names of the columns in the clustered index will be returned. 若要傳回的名稱或主索引鍵資料行的名稱，使用指定的主索引鍵名稱的 SELECT 陳述式中的查詢提示。To return the name or names of the primary key columns, use a query hint with the SELECT statement that specifies the name of the primary key index. 如需如何指定查詢提示的詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢提示 & Amp;#40;transact-SQL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181714.aspx)。For more information about how to specify query hints, see [Query Hint (Transact-SQL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181714.aspx). 如果遇到重複的資料行在填入，它會產生連續的資料行，並使用模式 」 columnname1"、"columnname2 」、 「 columnname3"，等等的名稱。If the encounters duplicate columns while populating a , it generates names for the successive columns, using the pattern "columnname1", "columnname2", "columnname3", and so on. 如果內送資料中包含未命名資料行，它們都放根據模式"Column1"、"Column2"，依此類推。If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are put in the according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on. 當多個結果集加入至，每個結果集放在個別的資料表。When multiple result sets are added to the , each result set is put in a separate table. 其他結果集的命名方式將整數值附加至指定的資料表名稱 （例如，"Table"、"Table1"、"Table2"，等等）。Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on). 使用資料行和資料表名稱，以確保沒有這些命名模式的衝突時，應用程式應謹慎小心。Applications should use caution when using column and table names to ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns do not occur. 傳回任何資料列。 returns no rows. 使用方法，以將資料列加入。Use the method to add rows to a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用於名為"Table"的來源資料表的對應。The uses only the mappings for the source table named "Table". 所有 SELECT、 INSERT、 DELETE 和 UPDATE 陳述式，傳回的資料必須執行使用一致的資料行命名。All SELECT, INSERT, DELETE, and UPDATE statements returning data must do so using consistent column naming. 傳回記錄中的資料行名稱必須是唯一，否則資料行名稱重複的覆寫先前的資料。The column names returned in the records must be unique, otherwise columns with duplicate names overwrite previous data. 在 ，則只會對應到名為"Table"的來源資料表的資料表必須協調其變更。On , only the table mapped to the source table named "Table" will have its changes reconciled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Update(class System.Data.DataSet dataSet) cil managed

span.span: The used to update the data source.

summary.span: 從命名為 "Table" 之 的指定 中，為每個插入、更新或刪除的資料列呼叫對應的 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 陳述式。

span.span: Calls the respective INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements for each inserted, updated, or deleted row in the specified from a named "Table".

returns.span: 自 中成功更新的資料列數目。

span.span: The number of rows successfully updated from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當應用程式呼叫方法中，會檢查屬性，並執行必要的 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 陳述式，反覆地針對每個的資料列中，然後再根據順序中設定的索引.When an application calls the method, the examines the property, and executes the required INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements iteratively for each row, based on the order of the indexes configured in the . 例如，可能會執行 DELETE 陳述式，後面接著 INSERT 陳述式和另一個的 DELETE 陳述式，因為順序中的資料列。For example, might execute a DELETE statement, followed by an INSERT statement, and then another DELETE statement, because of the ordering of the rows in the . 請注意，這些陳述式都不會執行以批次程序;個別更新每個資料列。Be aware that these statements are not performed as a batch process; each row is updated individually. 應用程式可以呼叫方法，如果您必須控制陳述式類型 （例如，在更新之前插入） 的順序。An application can call the method if you must control the sequence of statement types (for example, INSERTs before UPDATEs). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 Dataadapter 更新資料來源](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md)。For more information, see [Updating Data Sources with DataAdapters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md). 如果尚未指定 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 陳述式，方法會產生例外狀況。If INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements have not been specified, the method generates an exception. 不過，您可以建立或是物件來自動產生單一資料表更新的 SQL 陳述式，如果您將設定`SelectCommand`.NET Framework 資料提供者的屬性。However, you can create a or object to automatically generate SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the `SelectCommand` property of a .NET Framework data provider. 然後，您未設定任何其他 SQL 陳述式會產生 CommandBuilder。Then, any additional SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the CommandBuilder. 此層代 」 邏輯需要索引鍵資料行資訊會出現在。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 方法會從第一個對應，然後再執行更新中所列的資料表擷取資料列。The method retrieves rows from the table listed in the first mapping before performing an update. 然後更新使用的值的資料列屬性。The then updates the row using the value of the property. 傳回任何其他資料列都會被忽略。Any additional rows returned are ignored. 任何資料載入回後，則引發事件時，讓使用者能夠檢查協調資料列和任何輸出命令所傳回的參數。After any data is loaded back into the , the event is raised, allowing the user to inspect the reconciled row and any output parameters returned by the command. 已成功更新資料列之後，會接受該資料列所做的變更。After a row updates successfully, the changes to that row are accepted. 當使用，執行的順序如下所示：When using , the order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值會移至 參數值。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 便會引發 事件。The event is raised. 3. 執行命令。The command executes. 4. 如果命令設定為`FirstReturnedRecord`，則第一個傳回的結果會放在。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, then the first returned result is put in the . 5. 如果沒有輸出參數，它們都放。If there are output parameters, they are put in the . 6. 便會引發 事件。The event is raised. 7. 呼叫 。 is called. 每個相關聯的命令通常都有一個與其相關聯的參數集合。Each command associated with the usually has a parameter collection associated with it. 參數會對應至目前的資料列，透過`SourceColumn`並`SourceVersion`屬性的.NET Framework 資料提供者的`Parameter`類別。Parameters are mapped to the current row through the `SourceColumn` and `SourceVersion` properties of a .NET Framework data provider's `Parameter` class. `SourceColumn` 是指資料行，以取得目前資料列的參數值的參考。`SourceColumn` refers to a column that the references to obtain parameter values for the current row. `SourceColumn` 在套用任何資料表對應之前，是指未對應的資料行名稱。`SourceColumn` refers to the unmapped column name before any table mappings have been applied. 如果`SourceColumn`指的是不存在的資料行中，所採取的動作取決於下列其中一種值。If `SourceColumn` refers to a nonexistent column, the action taken depends on one of the following values. |列舉值Enumeration Value|採取的動作Action Taken| |-----------------------|------------------| |`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`|使用中的資料表名稱與來源資料行名稱如果不不存在任何對應。Use the source column names and table names in the if no mapping is present.| |`MissingMappingAction.Ignore`|A產生。A is generated. 時明確設定的對應，遺漏對應的輸入參數是通常會因發生錯誤。When the mappings are explicitly set, a missing mapping for an input parameter is usually caused by an error.| |`MissingMappingAction.Error`|A產生。A is generated.| `SourceColumn`屬性也會用來對應輸出的值，或輸入/輸出參數傳回`DataSet`。The `SourceColumn` property is also used to map the value for output or input/output parameters back to the `DataSet`. 如果它是指不存在的資料行，則會產生例外狀況。An exception is generated if it refers to a nonexistent column. `SourceVersion` .NET Framework 資料提供者的屬性`Parameter`類別會決定是否要使用`Original`， `Current`，或`Proposed`版本的資料行的值。The `SourceVersion` property of a .NET Framework data provider's `Parameter` class determines whether to use the `Original`, `Current`, or `Proposed` version of the column value. 這項功能是經常用來在 UPDATE 陳述式來檢查有開放式同步存取違規的 WHERE 子句中包含原始值。This capability is frequently used to include original values in the WHERE clause of an UPDATE statement to check for optimistic concurrency violations. > [!NOTE] > 如果在更新資料列時發生錯誤，會擲回例外狀況，並執行更新已停止。If an error occurs while updating a row, an exception is thrown and execution of the update is discontinued. 若要繼續更新作業，而不會產生例外狀況，當發生錯誤時，設定屬性，以`true`再呼叫。To continue the update operation without generating exceptions when an error is encountered, set the property to `true` before calling . 您也可以回應內每個資料列依錯誤`RowUpdated`DataAdapter 的事件。You may also respond to errors on a per-row basis within the `RowUpdated` event of a DataAdapter. 若要繼續更新作業，而不會產生例外狀況內`RowUpdated`事件，設定屬性至。To continue the update operation without generating an exception within the `RowUpdated` event, set the property of the to . ## Examples 下列範例會使用衍生的類別中，至資料來源。The following example uses the derived class, , to the data source. 這個範例假設您已建立和。This example assumes that you have created an and a . exception.span: 嘗試執行 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 陳述式會造成沒有資料錄受影響。

span.span: An attempt to execute an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statement resulted in zero records affected.
